glsa.title: KDE Plasma Workspaces: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in KDE Plasma Workspaces, the worst of which allows local attackers to execute arbitrary commands.

background.p: KDE Plasma workspace is a widget based desktop environment designed to be fast and efficient.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in KDE Plasma Workspaces. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

impact.p: An attacker could execute arbitrary commands via specially crafted thumb driveâ€™s volume labels or obtain sensitive information via specially crafted notifications.

workaround.p: Users should mount removable devices with Dolphin instead of the device notifier.
